name: freech-react
description: proxy-based Freech client written with react-js

scripts.build: jsx jsx build-buffer && browserify build-buffer/App.js -o build/app-bundle.js
scripts.pull-lib-and-build: cd ../freech-lib-js && npm run bundle && cd ../freech-react && cp ../freech-lib-js/freech-lib.js build && jsx jsx build-buffer && browserify build-buffer/App.js -o build/app-bundle.js

author: @martkist
